definitions.definition: A language formed from two or more languages which has developed from a pidgin to become a first language .
Alternative letter-case form of Creole ( “ person born in a colony ” ) .
A style of hoop earrings with a hoop that has an inconsistent thickness and/or is elongated in shape.

main_definition: ( linguistics ) A language formed from two or more languages which has developed from a pidgin to become a first language .
secondary_definitions: ( historical ) Alternative letter-case form of Creole ( “ person born in a colony ” ) .
( jewelry ) A style of hoop earrings with a hoop that has an inconsistent thickness and/or is elongated in shape.
